sub_fields.label: Story Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: background_gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Add a gradient to light-colored background images to make text easier to read.

sub_fields.label: Story Background Overlay
sub_fields.name: background_gradient

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Enter number of columns (of a possible 12) to determine proportion of the page width the statistic takes up
